about_the_game:
Save the world in this Magical Girl rhythm adventure! Your bond becomes their strength.
Let's open the door to the Dreamworld together.

About the game

Welcome to the first brand-new series created by Kogado Studio's "Kuroneko-san Team" in ten years! Guide your magical girl through a beautifully illustrated game world while exploring three distinct gameplay styles.

1. Immersive Story

Become intimately acquainted with the world and its characters. Enjoy detailed illustrations and skillful storytelling in the style of visual novel games.


2. Battles

Subdue enemies by wielding your newfound powers in an interactive RPG-style front-view battle system.


3. Skill-Based Rhythm Challenges

Purify the enemy, known as the MUMA, by completing various rhythm challenges.




Enjoy the first two episodes of a 12-episode installment. After completing chapters 1 and 2, and when you're ready to finish purifying the MUMA and safeguarding the residents of your city, make sure to pick up the rest of the episodes available in this exciting story.

※ This product contains episodes one and two out of a total of 12 episodes that are distributed individually.

Story

Meet Yumemi Nanahoshi, an unassuming junior high school student who lives in a small, sleepy town by the sea. Her life takes a dramatic turn with the sudden arrival of Kirara, the princess of the Little Star, an extraterrestrial whose own planet was viciously destroyed by a monster called "Muma."


Muma manipulates nightmares and consumes people's souls. He follows Kirara to Earth, and the only way to save everyone is for Yumemi to become a "Dreamer" and defeat Muma using the "Song of Purification."

With the support of her childhood friend Kanato, Yumemi becomes a Dreamer. She embarks on a mission to purify the Muma and eliminate the threat to her planet. Determined to protect the people on Earth, she also aims to preserve the dreams of all its inhabitants.

Staff

Making/IP: KOGADO STUDIO, INC. Kuroneko-san team
Director: Kuro Torikoshi
Series construction: Daisuke Tazawa (GEKKO INC.)／Pan Tachibana
Scenario supervision: Makoto Nishikawa　KOGADO STUDIO Literary section
Character design & Original art: AkkeyJIN
Graphics supervision: KOGADO STUDIO Digital art Dept.
Movie:yo-yu (feat. works)
Voice recording & Cooperation: STUDIO MAUSU

Music

Music production: Bit Groove Promotion

Main Song "Eternal Glow"
Lyrics: YOFFY（Psychic Lover）
Music: YOFFY（Psychic Lover）
Arrangement: Kenichiro Oishi
Vocalist: Emi Uema
Music by: Mashup Entertainment

Ending themesong "Yume no naka no senritsu"
Lyrics:: Ayaka Ota
Music: Hisao Sasaki
Arrangement: Hisao Sasaki
Vocalist: Ayaka Ota
Music by: Mashup Entertainment

featured song "Shiny☆Shiny DREAMER!!"
Lyrics: Ayaka Ota
Music: Yoru.
Arrangement: Yoru.

featured song "Trinity Material"
Lyrics: Emi Uema
Music: IMAJO（Psychic Lover）
Arrangement: IMAJO（Psychic Lover）

Cast voice actor

Kanato Kamio: Shuichiro Umeda

Yumemi Nanahoshi: Akane Fujita
Ayumu Kazahari: Marika Kono

Kirara star: Ayano Shibuya
Comet: Aya Yamane
Meteo star: Hikaru Akao

Tsukina Amano: Atsumi Tanezaki
Kotose Tsujiura: Asuka Nishi
Kou Mikado: Genta Nakamura
Suzune Kurachi: Maria Naganawa

Envyrose: Riho Sugiyama
Greedoll: Aya Suzaki
Belpheus: Kengo Kawanishi

content_descriptors.notes: Visual Novel with mature theme, some nudity and sexual content.

detailed_description:
Regarding save data

Please note that the save data of the demo version will not be carried over.


About Steam Deck Compatibility

This game is not compatible with Steam Deck.

name: Star Melody Yumemi Dreamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720, full color display environment
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Save the world in this Magical Girl rhythm adventure! Your bond becomes their strength.Let's open the door to the Dreamworld together.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
